title: Create FO-10 app directory with types and base components
description:
## Objective

Set up the FO-10 app directory structure with types, constants, and copy base UI components that are identical to FO-09.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md` — Section: "Reuse from FO-09"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- `app/fo-10/types.ts` — define FO10_QUESTIONS constant and FO10OnboardingData type
- `app/fo-10/components/` directory
- Copy these components unchanged from FO-09:
  - `heart-animation.tsx`
  - `step-welcome.tsx`
  - `step-familiarity.tsx`
  - `step-background.tsx`, `step-notifications.tsx`, `step-paywall.tsx`, `step-completion.tsx`
  - `affirmation-card.tsx`, `affirmation-card-flow.tsx`, `affirmation-summary.tsx`
  - `fragment-input.tsx`

**Key existing code:**
- `app/fo-09/types.ts` — reference structure
- `app/fo-09/components/` — copy from here

## Implementation

1. Create `app/fo-10/` directory
2. Create `types.ts` with FO10_QUESTIONS array (4 hardcoded questions from spec)
3. Create `components/` subdirectory
4. Copy components listed above from FO-09 (no modifications needed)
5. Update import paths in copied components to reference `../types`

## Tests

1. TypeScript compilation: `npx tsc --noEmit` passes
2. Verify FO10_QUESTIONS: `npx tsx -e "import {FO10_QUESTIONS} from './app/fo-10/types'; console.log(FO10_QUESTIONS.length === 4);"`

Do NOT close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit passes and FO10_QUESTIONS exports correctly
